title: TradFi mise à fond sur les baisses de taux de la Fed. Ce que cela signifie pour Bitcoin
description: La Fed a signalé hier qu’une politique monétaire beaucoup plus souple était prévue pour 2024.

title: TradFi punta tutto sui tagli dei tassi della Fed. Cosa significa per Bitcoin
description: Ieri la Fed ha segnalato che per il 2024 è in serbo una politica monetaria molto più accomodante.

title: TradFi aposta tudo nos cortes das taxas do Fed. O que isso significa para o Bitcoin
description: O Fed sinalizou ontem que uma política monetária muito mais fácil está reservada para 2024.

title: TradFi Goes All-In on Fed Rate Cuts. What It Means for Bitcoin
description: The Fed yesterday signaled that far easier monetary policy is in store for 2024.

title: Farcana Raises $10 Million for NFT Esports Shooter That Pays Out Bitcoin
description: Exclusive: The sci-fi, team-based hero shooter Farcana is still in early development. Now, it has a fresh round of capital to tap into.

title: How a Single Phishing Link Unleashed Chaos on Crypto
description: Ledger has confirmed the attack began because “a former Ledger employee fell victim to a phishing attack.”

title: DOJ targets cryptocurrency scammers in $80 million ‘pig butchering’ scheme
description:
The Department of Justice (DOJ) announced the indictment of four individuals implicated in a sophisticated operation to launder millions of dollars defrauded from victims through cryptocurrency investment scams, according to a Dec. 14 press release. The defendants — Lu Zhang, Justin Walker, Joseph Wong, and Hailong Zhu — face multiple charges, including conspiracy to commit […]

The post DOJ targets cryptocurrency scammers in $80 million ‘pig butchering’ scheme appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: IMF Chief calls for a comprehensive approach to crypto regulations
description: IMF's Chief sets a clear direction for future crypto regulation, emphasizing a balanced approach that nurtures innovation and protect users.

title: Avalanche Price Prediction 2023-2032: Time to Buy AVAX?
description: Avalanche Price Prediction 2023-2032 A quadrant chart by TrueUp (a tech recruitment firm) collated data from the job review platform Glassdoor — mapped out how crypto firms stack up regarding growth vs employee happiness.
